query: SELECT DATABASE() as current_db, @@hostname as host, @@port as port;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2E4HaJUB1R41J12.fcd4ff42607d --database H86jcAdP392wwbWXRcEDMs --execute SELECT DATABASE() as current_db, @@hostname as host, @@port as port;
